p: In the Sierra Nevada foothills and mountains, the ModStatLU and ModDynFSLU scenarios fire probability is generally lower under the CNRM climate future and in the early and mid 21 st c. under the MIROC climate future ( Fig 11). Under the same scenarios, MIROC exhibits a mix of higher and lower probability in the late 21 st c. In the same region, fire probability is generally lower for the ModDynFireLU scenario all time periods and both climate futures.
